resources.string: Use your email provided at the tome of registration to login into your account
Welcome, you\'re here means you\'ve got right to publish events on our Applications. But before publishing you should consider the following points
We\'ve made authentication easy for our user with Firebase
Enter the email address using which you\'ve registered to the application. Please use this feature only if you\'ve not received verification email.
Don\'t Know which Company Visited your college?
